data.meta_description: Learn about Charlton Heston on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Charlton Heston, such as Hercules, Armageddon and more.
data.text:
The One With Joey's Dirty Day

Charlton Heston finds Joey in a compromising position during a movie shoot. Meanwhile, Rachel regrets asking Ross for a favour, as he ends up spending the weekend in a Vermont cabin with Emily.

The Californians

Blake decides to enter into business with Jason Colby, Jeff's estranged uncle. Dex is angry when Alexis hints that he will go on a mission to rescue King Galen. Rita seeks plastic surgery to look more like Krystle.

The Titans

Jason Colby brings his family to Denver to announce a joint venture with the Carringtons.

The Man

Constance gives Jeff her half of the family business, Colby Enterprises. Krystle tries to make peace with Sammy Jo, while Sammy Jo moves forward with her plan to have Rita impersonate Krystle.
